title: We’ve run out of Koffee! KWK season 5 ends on March 19 | tv | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini We’ve run out of Koffee! KWK season 5 ends on March 19 
Karan Johar’s popular chat show, Koffee With Karan, is coming to a close on March 19. The next guests on the show will be directors Zoya Akhtar, Kabir Khan and Imtiaz Ali. tv Updated: Feb 24, 2017 15:36 IST Hindustan Times Karan Johar’s Koffee With Karan is ending soon.(Star World) 
The fifth season of Koffee With Karan now officially has an expiry date. According to a report in Pinkvilla , the popular chat show’s current season will end on March 19. Read more Kangana Ranaut on The Kapil Sharma Show: Here’s the segment where she lost it 
This year, the show had a string of blockbuster guests including Shah Rukh Khan, Alia Bhatt, Shahid Kapoor, Mira Rajput, Akshay Kumar, Twinkle Khanna, Kareena Kapoor and many more. While almost the entire season was a dull affair with celebrities indulging in next to no controversies, the last episode was full of explosive content. 
Kangana Ranaut, who had come on the show to promote her film Rangoon with co-star Saif Ali Khan, took Karan’s case on the show for being mean to her in her initial days as actor. She even called him a ‘movie mafia’ and accused him of promoting nepotism in Bollywood. They’re the best behind the camera, but are they as good in front of the camera? Find out this Sunday on #KoffeeWithKaran ! pic.twitter.com/GIbJAaQJcS — Star World (@StarWorldIndia) February 24, 2017 
The next episode will have directors Zoya Akhtar, Imtiaz Ali and Kabir Khan join Karan on the couch. 
Follow @htshowbiz for more
